alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 01 at 8:46AM EDT until April 04 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this morning to Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Red Lick Road, Millers Creek Road, Dark Hollow Road, and Noland Creek Road flood in several places. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 20.8 feet late tonight or early Sunday morning, before beginning to recede. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM EDT this evening.
